0.text: Innate: Nasus gains  9 / 14 / 19% (based on level) life steal.
0.html: Innate: Nasus gains  9 / 14 / 19% (based on level) life steal.
markedPassages: 9 / 14 / 19% (based on level) life steal

0.text: Active: Nasus empowers his next basic attack within 10 seconds to have an  uncancellable windup, gain  50 bonus range, and deal bonus physical damage.
0.html: Active: Nasus empowers his next basic attack within 10 seconds to have an uncancellable windup, gain  50 bonus range, and deal bonus physical damage.
markedPassages: uncancellable windup
50 bonus range

1.text: If Siphoning Strike kills the target, Nasus permanently gains 3 stacks, increased to 12 if the target is a  champion, large  minion, or large  monster.
1.html: If Siphoning Strike kills the target, Nasus permanently gains 3 stacks, increased to 12 if the target is a champion, large minion, or large monster.
markedPassages: champion
minion
monster

2.text: Siphoning Strike  resets Nasus' basic attack timer.
2.html: Siphoning Strike resets Nasus' basic attack timer.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Siphoning Strike  resets Nasus' basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Nasus ages the target enemy champion for 5 seconds,  slowing them by 35% and  crippling them by「 75% of that amount, 」「 26.25%, 」both increasing every second over the duration.
0.html: Active: Nasus ages the target enemy champion for 5 seconds, slowing them by 35% and crippling them by「 75% of that amount, 」「 26.25%, 」both increasing every second over the duration.
markedPassages: slowing
crippling
「 75% of that amount, 」「 26.25%, 」

0.text: Active: Nasus unleashes a spirit fire at the target location, granting  sight of the area for 2.5 seconds and, after a 0.264 seconds delay, dealing magic damage to enemies within.
0.html: Active: Nasus unleashes a spirit fire at the target location, granting sight of the area for 2.5 seconds and, after a 0.264 seconds delay, dealing magic damage to enemies within.
markedPassages: sight

1.text: The fire then remains for 5 seconds, dealing magic damage each second to enemies within and inflicting them with  armor reduction, lingering for 1 second.
1.html: The fire then remains for 5 seconds, dealing magic damage each second to enemies within and inflicting them with  armor reduction, lingering for 1 second.
markedPassages: armor reduction

0.text: Active: Nasus empowers himself for 15 seconds, gaining  bonus health,  bonus armor,  bonus magic resistance, increased size, and  50 bonus attack range for the duration.
0.html: Active: Nasus empowers himself for 15 seconds, gaining  bonus health,  bonus armor,  bonus magic resistance, increased size, and  50 bonus attack range for the duration.
markedPassages: bonus health
bonus armor
bonus magic resistance
50 bonus attack range

1.text: While Nasus is empowered, he deals magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies, capped at 240 per second, and  Siphoning Strike's  cooldown is halved.
1.html: While Nasus is empowered, he deals magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies, capped at 240 per second, and Siphoning Strike's  cooldown is halved.

0.content: 1.5 / 2 / 2.5% (+ 0.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
